technology.short_description: Each axe sports a wicked edge, fit to cut with ease through flesh and bone.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +2 per experience rank for all Dual Axe units
Ability: Rage for all dual-axe units (rank 4 and above)

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.
Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

technology.short_description: The motivating thrill of battle remains long after the last body falls, carrying Valkia forth on war-torn wings.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10% after winning a battle
Passive ability: "Revel in Slaughter" for Aspiring Champions units

technology.short_description: Khorne desires skulls, so gifts His followers with the initiative to find them. Every. Single. One.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Khorne
Army ability: "Blade of Khorne"

technology.short_description: Khorne sends His Bloodletters forth, answering the call of His illustrious Champion.

effects.description: Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Bloodletters units
Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Flesh Hounds units

technology.short_description: Even mortal warriors reap the rewards of Khorne, in exchange for bloodying of their blades.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% for each active Gift of Khorne
	(all armies)
Path to Glory: -25% Souls cost to devote to Khorne

technology.short_description: Daemonic steeds are driven by unnatural hunger, carrying mortals sworn to Chaos into battle in search of prey.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Gorebeast Chariots, Doom Knights, Rot Knights and Skullcrushers
Unit experience gain: +25% for Chaos Knights

technology.short_description: Mortal fighters partake in rampant slaughter, inspired by Khorne's murderous rage.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Hellblade" for Aspiring Champions and Chosen of Khorne units
Enables flaming attacks for Aspiring Champions units
Attribute: Unstoppable Charge for Chaos Knights of Khorne units

related_attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.
When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

technology.short_description: The dark rites must be performed, if the chosen are to rise among the ranks of Ruin.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Chosen
Unit experience gain: +25% for Chaos Warriors

technology.short_description: The arms of a Chaos Knight are imbued with a small but not inconsequential amount of Unholy power.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Chaos Knights
Enables magical attacks for Chaos Knights units

technology.short_description: Chaos Armour, inscribed with powerful litanies of hate, will glow hot and vengeful when struck.

effects.description: Unit Upgrades cost: -20% for all units
Armour: +10 for Chaos Warriors, Chosen, Chaos Knights and Aspiring Champion units

technology.short_description: All the forces of Chaos must unite, if the scourge of Order is to ever be undone.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Skaven, Beastmen and Norsca
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Skaven, Norsca and Beastmen for each active Gift of Chaos Undivided

technology.short_description: A worthy Beastmaster needs no chains to direct the ferocious nature of his darling pets.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8 for Chaos Warhounds and Feral Manticore units
Passive ability: "Gorefeast" for Chaos Warhounds and Feral Manticore units (Rank 4 and above)

technology.short_description: The Mark of Khorne burns the skin, a searing reminder of His rage.

effects.description: Warband upgrades: Allows Undivided units to receive the Mark of Khorne
Unlocks Warband upgrades: Exalted Bloodletters
Passive ability: "Frenzy" for Aspiring Champions units

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

technology.short_description: Khorne savours every sacrifice, bestowing vengeful inspiration on His armies as reward.

effects.description: Khorne Authority: +1 for each active Gift of Khorne

technology.short_description: Let the Marauders gather under their Dark Masters' eternal gaze.

effects.description: Unit experience gain: +50% for Marauders

technology.short_description: Engineers have perfected a wicked machine of war, drawn by fearsome steeds into the very heart of battle.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Chaos Chariots and Hellstriders
Unit experience gain: +50% for Marauder Horsemen

technology.short_description: A pact with the Dark Gods should not be taken lightly.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Chaos Undivided
Army ability: "Chaotic Torment" when attacking
Attribute: Cause Fear for Aspiring Champions and Undivided Chosen units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.

effects.description: Control: +1
All Authority: +1

technology.short_description: Such massive iron bands are a marvel to behold, lending strength to the swing of the most colossal creatures.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +20% for Chaos Trolls, Chaos Giant and Cockatrice units
Missile resistance: 20% for Chaos Trolls, Chaos Giant and Cockatrice units (Rank 4 and above)

technology.short_description: All hope to catch the attention of the Gods, gathering where they think the Ruinous Powers will be looking.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Chaos Undivided
Army ability: "Forsaken Blessing" when attacking
Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Aspiring Champions and Undivided Chosen units

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.
Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

effects.description: Control: +1
All Authority: +1

technology.short_description: The Gorequeen is but a vessel of Khorne's fury, brimming with hatred and the gifts of His gratitude.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Khorne
Passive ability: "Gorefeast" for Aspiring Champions units

technology.short_description: The most vicious of Khorne's Daemons flock to Valkia's side whenever the horn of battle sounds.

effects.description: Gifted Units pool capacity: +2 for Bloodthirsters units
Path to Glory: -25% Souls cost to upgrade characters to a Daemon Prince of Khorne
Recruitment cost: -25% for Chaos Marauder units

technology.short_description: The Chaos Gods grow impatient. Lending a sliver of majesty, they enable their followers to march faster.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5% for armies
Battle reinforcement time: -50%

technology.short_description: Tributes and monuments to the Dark Powers ensure the Chaos Gods' favour.

effects.description: Unlocks Hero recruitment and post-battle loot bonus effects for Altar Improvement buildings
Construction time: -20% for all buildings

technology.short_description: Such a generous gift is the thousand twisted blessings. Think of all the needle-teeth and tentacles it bestows.

effects.description: Unlocks Warband upgrades: Forsaken
Attribute: Cause Terror for Chaos Spawn units

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Spawn units

technology.short_description: Unholy tributes and towering monuments ensure the Chaos Gods' favour.

effects.description: [HIDDEN - do not translate] Used to increase lord rank when replacing a lord (target the effect at forces factionwide) - use in conjunction with a shown effect that targets provinces factionwide
Lord recruit rank: +3
Chaos corruption: +2 for each active Gift of Chaos Undivided

technology.short_description: Stragglers will not be entertained. If you can't keep the pace, you are food for the Warhounds.

effects.description: Souls gained from battles: +20%

technology.short_description: The bounty of souls sacrificed to the Blood God help spread the venomous seeds of His corruption.

effects.description: Khorne corruption: +2 from Chaos Altars
Khorne corruption: +2 for each active Gift of Khorne

technology.short_description: Perhaps the threat of a collar and chain would remind these lesser beings of their place.

effects.description: Request army cost: -25%
War co-ordination target cost: -25%

technology.short_description: There are lessons to be learned in blood, and Valkia memorises every one of them.

effects.description: Experience gain: +25% for characters

technology.short_description: Buildings erected on foundations of bone stand ever-unshakable in the face of war.

effects.description: Unlocks bonus income effect for Dark Fortress military buildings

technology.short_description: The Blood God never tires of hearing the war cry screamed in His name.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Khorne
Army ability: "Relentless Rage"

ui_effects.localised_text: Entities cannot die while ability is active

attributes.bullet_text: Entities in this unit take damage, but cannot die.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

technology.short_description: Those sworn to the Lord of Murder rejoice in every drop of blood spilled.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +25% for alliances and vassalage with Khorne
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Khornate factions for each active Gift of Khorne

technology.short_description: Valkia singles out the worthy among Khorne's warriors, destined to bear the Blood God's mark.

effects.description: Path to Glory: +50% levels kept when devoting a character to Khorne
Hero capacity: +2 for Exalted Heroes
Enables direct recruitment of Marked Exalted Heroes
